text: I just love cooking the Sunday suppers
I'll roast a whole chicken and I'll
bring it to the family and we'll sit
around and have this lovely leisurely
meal I've come up with something that's
a lot more convenient and it's just as
good
what makes this meal so convenient is
that I do the entire thing on two of
these great big sheet pans and by the
way if you don't have some of these go
buy them because they are the most
useful thing in the kitchen and what's
so great is that I can do my chicken and
my vegetables at the same time in the
same oven and then it all comes out
together
for this recipe I'm going to be using
sweet potatoes and I'm just gonna cut
them into 1 inch slices and then I'm
gonna put time in between which is just
gonna flavor them beautifully top sweet
potatoes well these are baking you can
prepare everything else these are gonna

whole-grain mustard here now what's
great about this mixture here is that
it's not only going to season the
chicken I'm also going to use it to
season the sweet potatoes and then this
becomes a sauce for later so in addition
to the whole-grain mustard I'm also
gonna add a little bit of Dijon gives it
that heat which is really nice and the
butter which just adds you know butter
you want to rub the mustard on all over
make sure to get the underside try to
use all the mustard mixture on this if

I've got broccoli rabe which my family

doesn't look like something you want to

is important you don't want to put these
into the oven until your chicken is
about ten minutes from being finished so
keep checking your chicken and when it
looks like it's almost there but not
quite that's when you slide the broccoli
rabe into the oven with it crisp chick
it's gorgeous broccoli rabe just a
